## ✅ Acceptance Criteria

Define what "done" looks like:

- [ ] Specific outcome 1

## 🏷️ Priority

- [ ] 🔴 Urgent (blocks other work)
- [ ] 🟡 High (important for upcoming milestone)
- [ ] 🟢 Medium (should be done soon)
- [ ] ⚪ Low (can be done later)

## ⏱️ Estimated Effort  

- [ ] 🟢 Small (< 4 hours)
- [ ] 🟡 Medium (4-16 hours)
- [ ] 🔴 Large (1-3 days)
- [ ] 🔥 Extra Large (> 3 days)

- [ ] Code is written and reviewed
